name: albert-dias-portfolio
description: Modern portfolio website with i18n support and dark/light theme

scripts.minify: npm run minify:html && npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: cssnano styles/tokens.css styles/tokens.min.css && cssnano styles/globals.css styles/globals.min.css && cssnano styles/components.css styles/components.min.css
scripts.minify:js: uglifyjs scripts/i18n.js -o scripts/i18n.min.js && uglifyjs scripts/theme.js -o scripts/theme.min.js && uglifyjs scripts/animations.js -o scripts/animations.min.js && uglifyjs scripts/main.js -o scripts/main.min.js

author: Albert Dias
